title: ASAPP transforms customer service using Claude AI to match human agent capabilities \ Anthropic

metadata.title: ASAPP transforms customer service using Claude AI to match human agent capabilities \ Anthropic
metadata.description: ASAPP leverages Claude in Amazon Bedrock to deliver secure, personalized customer service, achieving 25-40% better business outcomes while eliminating sensitive data concerns and enabling natural, context-aware customer conversations.
